wfe.title: calculation method of the wavefront error (dummy/random/fringe37)

psf.title: calculation method of the point spread function (gauss/real)

fN.title: Number of fp-cells of the psf data calculated by calc_psf

PixNum.title: Number of detector pixels for the side length of a single area

dx.title: x difference between psf center and detector pixel center

dy.title: y difference between psf center and detector pixel center

GaussPSFfwhm.title: FWHM of the gaussian PSF (for gauss PSF mode; in arcsec)

zernike_even.title: Amplitude parameter of even terms (ref_wl/zernike_even; for random mode).

zernike_odd.title: Amplitude parameter of odd terms (ref_wl/zernike_odd; for random mode).

fringe37_filename.title: Name of the file containing ZernikeFringe37 params (for fringe37 mode).

dtace.title: Timestep of ACE simulation in sec.

tace.title: Time range of ACE simulation in sec (to be adjusted).

acex_std.title: standard deviation of ACE along with X-axis (arcsec; gauss/real mode).

acey_std.title: standard deviation of ACE along with Y-axis (arcsec; gauss/real mode).

acex_seed.title: random number seed for ACE along with X axis (for real mode).

acey_seed.title: random number seed for ACE along with Y axis (for real mode).

Nplate.title: Number of plates which make up a small frame.

tplate.title: Exposure time of plate in second.
